title: Frustrating Issue
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Ugh~, I have so many ideas, I can’t even keep track of them all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ideas for our stream?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yup. I have a truckload of ideas......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Let me take a look...... Hmm, all of them seem fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I know, but we have to be realistic...... Renting out an amusement park, turning our school into a haunted house, holding a ramen noodle eating contest, or holding a mountain climbing relay race......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Out of those, turning the school into a haunted house sounds like the most probable idea.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Rejected.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hmm~, we can make one that doesn’t have anything that Eli-chi is afraid of. Let’s do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>But it won’t be funny because no one else will be afraid of the thing I’m afraid of.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>If that’s the case, then I reject your rejection......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
